attributes.action: stop poloticians doin what they believe is right and start doing what the people believe is right
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Todays political party members always do what they believe is right without taking the peoples view into consideration, the government needs now to prove the democracy we fight for and they claim to believe in works by doing the will of the people and not the will of just their political party, its not about them its about US.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
